{VERBOSE_REPORT;

  for(long i=0; i<n; i++){
    for(long j=0;   j<=i; j++){ s << " " << A(i,j) << " "<< std::flush; }
    for(long j=i+1; j<n;  j++){ s << "{" << A(j,i) << "}" << std::flush; }

{VERBOSE_REPORT;
  double max(-1.);
  for(int i=0; i<n; i++){
    for(int j=0; j<=i; j++){
      if( max<fabs(A(i,j)) ){
        I=i;
        J=j;
        max =fabs(A(i,j));
      }
    }
  }
  return;  
}

  zcovector_small<n> C(0.);

    for(long j=0; j<i; j++){
      C(i) +=A(i,j)*B(j);
    }
    for(long j=i; j<n; j++){

    }
  }

Definition at line 404 of file zhematrix_small-functions.hpp.

References i().

{VERBOSE_REPORT;
  zgematrix_small<n,n> X(0.);
  for(long i=0; i<n; i++){
    for(long j=0; j<i; j++){
      for(long k=0; k<j; k++){
        X(i,j) +=A(i,k)*B(j,k);
      }
      for(long k=j; k<i; k++){
        X(i,j) +=A(i,k)*B(k,j);
      }
      for(long k=i; k<n; k++){
        X(i,j) +=A(k,i)*B(k,j);
      }
    }
    for(long j=i; j<n; j++){
      for(long k=0; k<i; k++){
        X(i,j) +=A(i,k)*B(j,k);
      }
      for(long k=i; k<j; k++){
        X(i,j) +=A(k,i)*B(j,k);
      }
      for(long k=j; k<n; k++){
        X(i,j) +=A(k,i)*B(k,j);
      }
    }
  }
  return X;
}
